'The Web Hosting Specialists'

Localnode - The last web hosting provider you’ll ever need. Affordable prices with a personal touch.

*-*-*-* SIX REASONS to choose Localnode TODAY *-*-*-*

1. No Overcrowding.
Some of our competitors oversell their servers, leading to slow response times and unreliable service. That’s no way to treat your customers, which is why at Localnode, the resources you expect will always be available for you to use. We undersell our hosting services, and that translates to superior performance for you.

2. Superior Hardware.
We like it when things just work. We use only superior hardware and we’re not above dropping a name or two to prove it. Supermicro servers, Kingston RAM and Intel XEON processors ensure the reliable hosting experience you deserve. Our hardware is built to perform.

3. Superior Network.
Our multiple Tier 1 providers and network redundancy help our clients’ sites run smoothly at optimal speed, ensuring a consistent and reliable experience for visitors from around the world.

4. Expert 24/7/365 Tech-Support.
Reliable shared web hosting requires top-notch support. Our experienced and friendly staff are available around the clock and our shared goal is always to solve it the first time – with none of the “quick to respond, slow to fix” problems you’ll find with other providers.

5. 99.9% Uptime, Guaranteed.
You need the most reliable web hosting for your website and the comfort of knowing that it will work all the time. Our 99.9% uptime guarantee is our promise to you that our expert staff will do everything necessary to ensure that your website is available. (see our Service-Level Agreement for details).

6. Amazing Value For Money.
You won't find premium web hosting this good at prices this low anywhere else.

Localnode Servers...

Localnode invests in state-of-the-art hardware. Supermicro servers featuring Intel Xeon Processors, Kingston Memory and Intel high-performance solid-state drives allow us to provide the reliable web hosting you deserve. Plus, we help you protect your data with full RAID on all of our servers and our 3-tier backup system using ClusterLogics Continuous Data Protection.
  • SuperMicro® industry-leading server board
  • Pure SSD Storage
  • Powerful Intel® Xeon® processors
  • Kingston® ECC Memory
  • LSI® RAID Controller (with BBU & FastPath)

Localnode Datacentre...

Localnode Located in Los Angeles, California, the data centre is designed for speed and 99.9% guaranteed network uptime under high usage and mission-critical circumstances. In addition to an impressive list of top-tier carriers, our data centre features multiple uninterruptible power supplies, automatic transfer switches, CRAC units, independent distribution routers, and backup diesel generators, which ensure the stable, reliable hosting you need, even during power failures. This datacentre is SSAE16 SOC2 certified.

On-premises security is a top priority. Staff are carefully vetted, assigned clearance, and tracked and logged. Video monitoring and staff-escorted visitation procedures ensure our servers are kept safe and secure.

About Localnode...

We are Localnode, an affordable web hosting company providing reliable shared hosting services to individuals, businesses and corporations around the world.

So what? There are thousands of companies just like you, right?
Click to expand...

The answer is simple. While it is true that other companies provide similar services – and make similar claims – we are proud of what sets us apart. If you have ever had the experience of dealing with companies who make you feel like you’re nothing more than a number, then Localnode offers a welcome change.

We genuinely love what we do. We have fun doing it. And when you sign up with us, you will see the real difference in quality that only a reliable hosting provider committed to providing rockstar performance can deliver.


Want more information? Great! Just email us at sales@localnode.net or click here to visit our website.
